typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	run_id as string
}
source(output(
		EFF_DATE as date 'yyyy-MM-dd',
		END_DATE as date 'yyyy-MM-dd',
		BEGIN_FLT_NBR as integer '##0',
		END_FLT_NBR as integer '##0',
		FLIGHT_TYPE as string,
		FLIGHT_SUBTYPE as string,
		FLT_TYPE_OPS_REPORT as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> FltNbrMatrix
FltNbrMatrix sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> FltNbrMatrixToSQL
